FuncDef: This command specifies a Service Access Point (SAP) or an ESM subscriber as matching criteria.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the value configured and the value in the flow are equal.
Specifies that the value configured differs from the value in the flow.
Specifies the name of an existing application assurance subscriber.
Specifies the name of an ESM-MAC subscriber.
Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
Specifies the spoke SDP ID and VC ID. Values-1 to 32767.
Specifies the name of a transit AA subscriber.
